Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen BodyProjectile is a class for projectiles in the world. Because bodies must always be in some world, but projectiles must exist outside the world too, we have a separate Projectile class. This class is only a "capsule" for the projectile to be in the world. Almost everything is still done in the Projectile class.
